attributes.action: ensure that no person be disqualified from any communication if any culture permits the use of said communication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ensure the free expression of all citizens in all mediums of human communication. It does not subscribe in any way shape or form to those parts of communication that directly lead to discrimination nor bullying but promotes the use of all language, representation and communication of ideals  or beliefs that one culture uses, to ensure integration throughout all cultures by the availability of said subject to all.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
